song.title: Carried Away
song.info:
3rd in streaming music competition at Revision 2014
I got carried away on a summer day no more pain no more decay I will never turn away
so many things to say on a summer day all I want is you to stay with me I'll never turn away
I'll never let you down
I'll never change the way it used to be it's neither status nor esprit
cuz
i got carried away
